Detailed Description

ChvProvider is the provider to retrieve different states of the different pins of the mobile station. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_chv_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_no_id :NumberType: c_state_id :NumberType: c_attempts_left_id :NumberType: c_unblocking_attempts_left_id:NumberType:

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
